alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:23PM EDT until June 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Shiawassee County in southeastern Michigan... Livingston County in southeastern Michigan... Genesee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 623 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oak Grove, or near Hartland, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Linden around 640 PM EDT. Fenton around 645 PM EDT. Lake Fenton around 650 PM EDT. Grand Blanc and Goodrich around 700 PM EDT. Davison and Burton around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Atlas, Rankin, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Argentine, Conway Township, Genesee, Vernon, Juddville, Lakeland and Chilson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
